casebody.data:
WEBER, HODGES & GODWIN COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE SERVICES, LLC
v.
John D. COOK and Rose B. Cook. No. 529P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. G. Gray Wilson, Winston-Salem, for Cook. William H. Gifford, Jr., for Real Estate Services.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 31st day of October 2007 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th day of April 2008."
